name: The coding-theoretic function A(n,12,7).
comment: Packing number D(n,7,2). Maximum number of edge-disjoint K_7's in a K_n. - _Rob Pratt_, Feb 26 2024

ext: The version in the Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences had 1 instead of 2 at n=13.
